name: TC 04_02_09_13 Verify presence of strong password strength hint
description: Verify presence of Password Strength hint and warning color of weak password
descriptionHtml: Verify presence of Password Strength hint and warning color of weak password
statusMessage:
XFAIL Flaky behavior on CI

AssertionError: Password Strength hint is not present or not displayed or has wrong color
assert ('Password Str...: No Password' == 'Password Strength: Weak'
  - Password Strength: Weak
  ?                    ^^ ^
  + Password Strength: No Password
  ?                    ^^^^ ^^^^^^)
statusTrace:
self = <test_create_an_account.TestCreateAnAccount object at 0x7faf4a488590>
create_account_page = <pages.create_an_account_page.CreateAccountPage object at 0x7faf49460a10>
password_strength_msg = {'password': 'we', 'strength_password': 'Weak', 'strength_password_hint': 'Password Strength: Weak', 'warning_color': '#ffafae', ...}

    @pytest.mark.xfail(reason="Flaky behavior on CI")
    @allure.title('TC 04_02_09_13 Verify presence of strong password strength hint')
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.BLOCKER)
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('password_strength_msg', password_strength_msg)
    def test_04_02_09_13_password_strength_hint(self, create_account_page, password_strength_msg):
        """ Verify presence of Password Strength hint and warning color of weak password """
        password_strength_hint_message, message_error, hex_color = \
            create_account_page.check_password_strength_hint_with_different_passwords(password_strength_msg)
>       assert password_strength_hint_message == password_strength_msg['strength_password_hint'] \
               and hex_color == password_strength_msg["warning_color"] \
               and password_strength_msg['warning_password_message'] == message_error, \
            "Password Strength hint is not present or not displayed or has wrong color"
E       AssertionError: Password Strength hint is not present or not displayed or has wrong color
E       assert ('Password Str...: No Password' == 'Password Strength: Weak'
E         - Password Strength: Weak
E         ?                    ^^ ^
E         + Password Strength: No Password
E         ?                    ^^^^ ^^^^^^)

steps.name: Check password strength hint and color
Check Password input field is visible
Check Create An Account Button is visible
Check Message Password Error hint is visible
Check Password Strength hint is visible
Check Password Strength hint is visible
Transform rgb color to hex form
